Text: Valuable online resources for our membersDear Bally Member Thank you for providing us with your email address Periodically we may send you emails regarding your membership Youll enjoy how easy email makes it for you to receive this important information Did you know you can also register for FREE health and fitness related emails They are filled with the latest exercise techniques nutritional advice and special promotional offers just for Bally members Sign up today and start receiving this helpful information by clicking here appsredirasplinkXbcjeegjDFZbhdgfjjbgEHoidUcdeeBD If you are not interested in receiving these health and fitness emails you do not need to do anything Weve also enhanced ballyfitnesscom with a valuable new feature instant access to all your important account information Visit My Account at ballyfitnesscom by clicking here appsredirasplinkXbcjeehaCHZbhdgfjjbgEHoidUcdeeBD You will be able to Check your membership expiration date Confirm your next payment amount and due date Access your membership balance Thank you for choosing Bally Total Fitness to help you meet your health and fitness goals We hope to hear from you soon Sincerely Bally Total Fitness PS Have a more specific question about your membership Click here to contact us now appsredirasplinkXbcjeehcCJZbhdgfjjbgEHoidUcdeeBD Please do not reply to this email Instead please use the appropriate links provided Bally Total Fitness is a registered trademark of Bally Total Fitness Holding Corporation Your privacy is our first priority If you decide not to register we will not utilize your email address in future promotional emails If you would like to be excluded from all future emails click here to optout appsredirasplinkXbcjeehdDAZbhdgfjjbgEHoidUcdeeBD To obtain more information on our privacy policy click here appsredirasplinkXbcjeeheDBZbhdgfjjbgEHoidUcdeeBD
